title: Going to USC Screening of Helvetica! Woo Hoo! Who's with me?
content:
Um, that’s all I got. Who else is going tomorrow night?

 [‹ Pair with Perpetua?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205012037/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33361 "Go to previous forum topic") [Pinball ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205012037/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33350 "Go to next forum topic")
author: enrico_limcaco

comments.content:
I’ll be there (around 8:15) with some of my students  
and of course the [half-dozen remaining] shirts! :-\>  
 [http://typophile.com/node/33285](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205012037/http:/typophile.com/node/33285 "http://typophile.com/node/33285")

hhp
Hope I can get there in time...will probably be in around 9pm. Do you have any XL or XXL shirts?

I’m going to the later one too - I’ll just be getting there early - which is actually what they advised seeing as how people RSVP but won’t be paying until they get there, which means the flake count will be high, which I’m sure they anticipate, which means if you’re late your place might be given away...

BTW if you want a shirt make sure to reserve one (not all sizes are left).

hhp
